appliedOnHostingPlatform(string,string).details: marks a poll as applied on the hosting platform

params._hostingplatform: the name of the hosting platform, where the pull request is happening
params._pullRequestId: technical id of the pull request on the hosting platform

appliedOnHostingPlatform(uint256).details: marks a poll as applied on the hosting platform

params.pollKey: The index of the poll to mark as transferred

constructor.details: Create a new ballot to choose one of 'proposalNames'.

getNextVoteFinishedButUntransfered().details: Returns the next finished vote, that was not yet transfered to the hosting platform, returns 0 if noone is found

getPollIndex(string,string).details: searches for the poll index of a given poll

params._hostingplatform: the name of the hosting platform, where the pull request is happening
params._pullRequestId: technical id of the pull request on the hosting platform

getVotingResult(string,string).details: calculates the voting result in the database

params._hostingplatform: the name of the hosting platform, where the pull request is happening
params._pullRequestId: technical id of the pull request on the hosting platform

getVotingResult(uint256).details: calculates the voting result in the database

params.key: The index of the poll to mark as transferred

submitNewPoll(string,string,string,strin.details: Submit a new pull request into the voting database

params._description: description of the poll / text of the pull request
params._hostingplatform: the name of the hosting platform, where the pull request is happening
params._pullRequestId: technical id of the pull request on the hosting platform
params._pullRequestLink: link to the pull request on the hosting provider web ui
params._title: title of the poll / title of the pull request
params._voteEnd: timepoint of the vote to end

vote(uint256,bool).details: Allows to perform a vote. The current user will be taken as executor.

params.approve: true means to acceppt the pull request, false it should be declined
params.key: the pull request index to vote for / can be received via getKey getPollIndex

voteFake(uint256,bool,address).details: This is a fake voting method, to test this smart contract without having to many accounts. It should be deactivated in productive use

params.approve: true means to acceppt the pull request, false it should be declined
params.key: the pull request index to vote for / can be received via getKey getPollIndex
